meanings.definition: To buy or acquire in advance.
meanings.sent1: She prepurchased tickets for the concert next month.
meanings.sent2: They always prepurchased their groceries online to save time.
meanings.sent3: He prepurchased a new video game, but then realized he didn't have the right gaming console!
meanings.sent4: The students prepurchased their textbooks, eager to start the new semester.
meanings.sent5: The family prepurchased their vacation package, ensuring they got the best deals.

meanings.sent1: The prepurchased gift arrived just in time for the birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The prepurchased movie tickets allowed them to skip the long line at the theater.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a prepurchased present waiting to be unwrapped on Christmas morning.
meanings.sent4: The prepurchased plane tickets made their upcoming trip feel even more real.
meanings.sent5: The prepurchased concert merchandise was a special treat for the fans.
